notes: If you have >=2.2 weighted sac outlets, you don't need to tutor a specific outlet piece as often.
why_it_matters: Redundancy reduces access burden for core engine enablers.

notes: Amplifiers can be redundant; access burden reduced if multiple present.
If you have multiple turn-ending effects, Sundial isn't a single point of failure.
why_it_matters: Temporal engines can be stabilized with redundancy.

notes: Stack protection redundancy can cover for single protection card losses.
